faq.title: Common Questions, Clear Answers
faq.description: Everything you need to know about how Legalyze analyzes your contracts.

items.question: What file types and contract types are supported?
items.answer: Legalyze accepts PDF and DOCX files up to 10MB. It works with any contract type: NDAs, SaaS agreements, freelance contracts, employment agreements, vendor contracts, and more.

items.question: How fast is the analysis?
items.answer: For contracts under 5,000 words, you'll have a full risk report in under 10 seconds. Longer documents may take slightly more time depending on complexity.

items.question: What does the AI actually check for?
items.answer: It scans for high-risk clauses (unlimited liability, one-sided indemnification, IP ownership grabs, non-compete overreach) and missing protections (no termination rights, no dispute resolution, no GDPR clause, no auto-renewal warning), then gives each a 0–100 risk score.

items.question: Is my document kept private?
items.answer: Yes. Your documents are processed securely, never shared with third parties, and are not used to train our models. You can delete your data at any time from your account.

items.question: What is the redline export?
items.answer: After analysis, you can download a .docx file with tracked changes: original risky clauses shown as strikethrough, AI-suggested replacements as insertions, and comments explaining each edit. Open directly in Word or Google Docs.
